headline: What Could Shift The Story For Duke Energy (DUK) As Valuation And Demand Themes Collide
summary: Why Duke Energy’s Price Target Just Got Tweaked Duke Energy’s analyst fair value estimate has been adjusted slightly, moving from about US$136.18 to about US$136.35 per share, with the discount rate assumption holding close to 6.96% and the modeled revenue growth rate at about 5.03%. This fine tuning reflects how recent Street research is weighing the company’s portfolio cleanup, balance sheet work, and regulatory progress against both bullish enthusiasm and more cautious views that see much...

headline: Assessing Duke Energy (DUK) Valuation After Debary Green Hydrogen Project Unveiling
summary: Duke Energy (DUK) is back in focus after unveiling its DeBary Hydrogen Production Storage System in Florida, a first of its kind U.S. project that can handle up to 100% green hydrogen end to end. See our latest analysis for Duke Energy. The DeBary hydrogen project arrives after a period where momentum has cooled, with a 90 day share price return decline of 7.64%, even as Duke Energy’s 1 year total shareholder return sits at 12.32% and 5 year total shareholder return at 55.71%, pointing to a...
